cause.description:
The mission of ACS is to ELIMINATE cancer! The money raised is used in four ways:
1) Research 2) Education 3) Patient Services 4) Advocacy
1. Hope - That those who have lost the battle will never be forgotten!
2. Hope - That those affected will be supported!
3. Hope - That cancer will one day be ELIMINATED!!
cause.name: Bledsoe County Relay for Life
